in return for

Please let me know if you accept!

Gashouse GM

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Mickey Hart
Dear Sir,
Mickey Hart has nothing more to prove at A Hana Rainbows!
He has an AVG of .313 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Aldo Guerrero
Dear Sir,
Aldo Guerrero is doing pretty good at A Hana Rainbows!
He has an ERA of 3.92, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Status of Santo Miller
Dear Sir,
Santo Miller shouldn't play at AA Maui Whalers!
He has an AVG of .193 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
